name: RE:volve B&W Jam
description:
This game is part of the B&W Jam 8.

Guide yourself through the cave and try to find your way out, those mysterious idols? why not pick them up, they may come in handy in the future 😉, be patient you will spend a long time in this cave... MUAHAHAHAHAHA 😈!

Controls are: 

Keyboard:

A/D to move

S to Stomp

E to Use,

Q/Esc to Pause the Game 

Mouse:

LM for Sword attack

RM for Gunshot

Have fun and don't get killed!
